active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the unique risks of service discovery poisoning in cloud-native microservices (e.g., Kubernetes with Consul or etcd) versus traditional monolithic applications. Consider how dynamic scaling exacerbates vulnerabilities and propose trade-offs between service availability and security.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

distractor_protocol.step: Identify common misconceptions about the topic
Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
Include partial truths that require deeper understanding

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education on 'Service Discovery Poisoning' (Topic Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > Security Architecture And Engineering > Security Architecture Vulnerabilities > Application Architecture Vulnerabilities > Microservices Architecture Weaknesses > Service Discovery Poisoning). Use university pedagogy: Bloom's Taxonomy (objectives provided), active learning (discussion/peer/problem-solving), scaffolding (4 layers: Foundation>Components>Implementation>Integration), and research context (service discovery via DNS-SD/mDNS/registries; poisoning via DNS spoofing/registry compromise/mDNS exploits; threats: external/on-link/MITM). Generate 50 high-quality flashcards (10 per scaffolding layer, balanced Bloom's: 20% remember/understand, 30% apply/analyze, 30% evaluate, 20% create). Optimize for Anki/Spaced Repetition: MCQ or cloze, vivid questions, no trivia. Incorporate: - Learning Objectives: [paste array here] - Active Learning: [reference activities in explanations] - Scaffolding: Tag each card with layer (e.g., #Layer1). - Schema: Front=Question+Options; Back=Answer+Explanation+HInt+Reference. Distractors per protocol. Output JSON array: [{'front':'...', 'back':'...', 'layer':1, 'blooms_level':'Apply', 'tags':['microservices','DNS']}, ...]. Ensure web-grounded, no fabrication.
